title: Clean Air, Cloud Science
text: Clean Air, Cloud Science is the 2005 debut <a href="Extended%20play">EP</a> by <a href="Chicago">Chicago</a> band <a href="Cains%20%26amp%3B%20Abels">Cains & Abels</a>. This album was released on New Blood and distributed by <a href="States%20Rights%20Records">States Rights Records</a>.
